title.romaji: ROAD TO NINJA: NARUTO THE MOVIE
title.english: Road to Ninja: Naruto the Movie

description:
Ten years ago, a gigantic demon beast known as the Nine-Tailed Demon Fox was released from its jinchuuriki by an unknown shinobi wearing a mask. The village of Konohagakure was close to destruction by the attack of the Nine-Tails, but the village was saved by its leader. Minato Namikaze and his wife Kushina Uzumaki—who was the jinchuuriki at the time of the attack—sealed away the demon inside their new born son: Naruto Uzumaki. However, this act of saving the village cost them their lives and they left the future of the ninja world to Naruto.

With the demon fox sealed away, things continued as normal. However, the peace of the village would not last long, for Pain, Konan, Itachi Uchiha, Kisame Hoshigaki, Sasori, Deidara, Hidan and Kakuzu—members of a dreaded shinobi group called the Akatsuki—attacked Konohagakure. Naruto narrowly manages to launch a counter-attack but why have these shinobi appeared when all of them were meant to have died? The mystery remains, but the shinobi are praised by heir families for completing such a dangerous mission. However, one of them who has never known the faces of his parents, Naruto, cannot help but feel lonely. At that exact time, suddenly, the masked man makes his appearance in Konoha. Naruto and his allies are both attacked by the man's mysterious new doujutsu.

(Source: Naruto Wikia)
synonyms: Naruto Shippūden la película: El camino Ninja
Naruto Shippuden Movie 06: La via del Ninja
Naruto Shippuden the Movie 6: Road to Ninja

node.description: Masashi Kishimoto is a Japanese manga artist, well known for creating the manga series [Naruto](https://anilist.co/manga/30011/Naruto/). His younger twin brother, [Seishi Kishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/96897/Seishi-Kishimoto), is also a manga artist and creator of the manga series [666 Satan](https://anilist.co/manga/30032/OParts-Hunter/) and [Blazer Drive](https://anilist.co/manga/36612/Blazer-Drive/). He is good friends with [Eiichirou Oda](https://anilist.co/staff/96881/Eiichirou-Oda)

name.native: アジアン・カンフー・ジェネレーション

node.description:
[Website](http://www.asiankung-fu.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AKG_information) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC52_sWDVAOwq5TaaA44kp-A)

Asian Kung-Fu Generation, stylized as ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION, is a Japanese alternative rock band formed in 1996.

Starting out as a college band, they released a series of independent EPs featuring lyrics mostly sung in English. In 2002, they released their major-label EP debut Hokai Amplifier, from that point singing their lyrics in Japanese. The band's musical style is influenced by seminal Western alternative rock acts as well as their own local Japanese indie-rock and punk scene. Their songs incorporate various aspects of the genres, most typically expressing fast tempos and prominent power chord guitar riffs in addition to rhythmic groove and emotional lyrics. Despite the indie nature of their music, the band has enjoyed worldwide commercial success in addition to critical acclaim.

They have also been cited as one of the best, most balanced modern rock bands to emerge from Japan in the '00s.

__Members:__
- [Masafumi Gotou](https://anilist.co/staff/159934/) - vocalist
- [Kensuke Kita](https://anilist.co/staff/220702/) - guitarist
- [Takahiro Yamada](https://anilist.co/staff/159937/) - bassist
- [Kiyoshi Ijichi](https://anilist.co/staff/220703/) - drummer

(Source: Wikipedia)
Originating from [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/) where he studied under [Atsuko Nakajima](https://anilist.co/staff/102141/).

Nishio graduated from Nagoya Designer Academy and started his career at Anime Spot, a subcontracting studio, after being refused in interviews with several animation studios. He debuted as an in-betweener on [Osomatsu-kun](https://anilist.co/anime/9883/) and as a key animator on [Laughing Salesman](https://anilist.co/anime/3077/).

It's on [Yu Yu Hakusho](https://anilist.co/anime/392//) that Nishio came into his own as an animator, developing weighty and realistic movements influenced by [Satoru Utsunomiya](https://anilist.co/staff/101489/). Thanks to the ability demonstrated there, he was chosen to design the characters for [Ninku](https://anilist.co/anime/912/).

After working as character designer and chief animation director on [Jin-Roh](https://anilist.co/anime/570/) he permanently joined Production I.G. where he became known, together with [Hiroyuki Okiura](https://anilist.co/staff/103502/) and [Kazuchika Kise](https://anilist.co/staff/115781/), as "The Three Gods of I.G."

[Masashi Kishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/96879/) requested for Nishio to be the character designer of the Naruto anime.

In August 2020, he was promoted to company director of Production I.G alongside [Takayuki Gotou](https://anilist.co/staff/103266/Takayuki-Gotou/), a co-founder of the studio.
Known for his involvement in the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/1735/) franchise.
Known for his involvement in the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/1735/) franchise.
Known for his involvement in the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/1735/) franchise.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大西雅也)

Long-time key member of [Studio Pierrot](https://anilist.co/studio/1/). Married to [Takako Oonishi](https://anilist.co/staff/139180/).

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/LaloGarx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/lalogarx/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/LaloGarx) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/Eduardogaara)

**José Eduardo Garza Escudero** is a Mexican voice actor. He is known for being the Latin American Spanish voice of Josh Nichols in _Drake & Josh_, Elmo in _Sesame Street_ and Francis in _Malcolm in the Middle_.
He's the recurring dub voice of Josh Peck and Jonah Hill.

**Non-Anime Roles**:
* Kayn (League of Legends)
* Nightwing / Dick Grayson (Batman: Arkham Knight)
* Dirhael (Middle-Earth: Shadow of Mordor) 
* Delmont "Del" Walker (Gears of War 4)
* Josh Nichols (Drake & Josh)
